co.cask.cdap.api.app

Class AbstractApplication<T extends Config>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.api.app.AbstractApplication<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Config config class that represents the configuration of the Application.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Application<T>

    public abstract class AbstractApplication<T extends Config>
extends Object
implements Application<T>
    A support class for Applications which reduces repetition and results in a more readable configuration.

    Implement the configure() method to define your application.

    See Also:
    co.cask.cdap.api.app

      • scheduleWorkflow

        protected void scheduleWorkflow(Schedule schedule,
                    String workflowName)
        Schedules the specified Workflow
        Parameters:

      • scheduleWorkflow

        @Deprecated
protected void scheduleWorkflow(String scheduleName,
                               String cronTab,
                               String workflowName)
        Deprecated. As of version 2.8.0, replaced by scheduleWorkflow(Schedule, String)
        Schedules the specified Workflow using a time-based schedule.
        Parameters:
        scheduleName - the name of the Schedule
        cronTab - the crontab entry for the Schedule
        workflowName - the name of the Workflow

      • scheduleWorkflow

        @Deprecated
protected void scheduleWorkflow(String scheduleName,
                               String cronTab,
                               String workflowName,
                               Map<String,String> properties)
        Deprecated. As of version 2.8.0, replaced by scheduleWorkflow(Schedule, String, Map<String, String>)
        Schedules the specified Workflow using a time-based schedule.
        Parameters:
        scheduleName - the name of the Schedule
        cronTab - the crontab entry for the Schedule
        workflowName - the name of the Workflow
        properties - properties to be added for the Schedule
